annonstext:
Our customer is a leading company that provides service and network assurance by using big data and IoT traffic. They provide intelligence that are used for analytical, troubleshooting and reporting purposes and great insights. The company builds at system within the telecom area which collects massive amounts of signaling and data from hundreds of operators.

About the role
You will be a part of an agile teams that get challenged within the problem solving and analytical area. You will for example be a part of buidling out the 5G network and adding several layers in order to build in different standards. 95% of the tasks involve mobile telephony and you will work with customers in around 50 countries.  You will work with low level, binary signaling, decoding messages and builidng analysis and statistics.

This  role involves a lot of problem solving and analysis which suits you if you are motivated by technically challenging tasks.

Qualifications
- Experience within technical telecom with some programming skills for example Java, C# or similar
- Degree in Computer Science, Engineering Physics, Electrical Engineering or similar

Additional information
For this role you will be employed by our customer.

Salary: Fixed
Scope: Full time
Start: As soon as possible taking into account your notice period
Placeringsort: Stockholm

We process applications on an ongoing basis and the position may be filled before the application period has expired, send your application today!

About Procruitment
Our goal is to give companies power to grow with the right people. At the same time, we provide job opportunities to people throughout their working lives.

Today's newly graduated talent - tomorrow's specialist or leader. No matter where you are in your career, we are a partner for you - today and tomorrow
